programme.desc: Rhade leads the rebels in battle against a warlord on Seefra-5.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan discovers that Beka's boyfriend was really Drago Musevini, and he used Beka's DNA to create the Nietzscheans.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of 53-year-old, Cynthia Greenwood-Smith, to unravel the lies and discover the grim truth surrounding her disappearance from her Gold Coast home in 2001.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: While excitedly preparing for Charlotte’s first birthday party, Tess receives a process server from Peter Johnson, Charlotte’s biological father, demanding custody. Distressed, Tess calls on the Ryans for help.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: As Tess tries to come to terms with the custody battle for Charlotte, the re-opening of a long forgotten well on Drovers Run brings to the surface some ghosts from the past.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Drover’s has a squatter problem: somebody is lighting campfires. While tracking the culprit, Stevie (Simmone Jade Mackinnon) comes to grips with a mysterious and handsome stranger whom it turns out is her ex-husband, Jarred (Grant Bowler).

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: It’s sale day and Tess (Bridie Carter) is in a hurry to register her cattle so that they can get the best price. The truck stop is crowded with people wanting to do exactly the same thing.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg’s sister, Celia Rivers (Glenda Linscott), arrives at Drovers. Partly apprehensive, partly excited, Meg has always lived in the shadow of her glamorous, talented, singing sister. But Celia has arrived for a sea-change, or a country change.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg is full of preparations for her and Jodi’s leave taking, and in her excitement fails to notice that Jodi is harbouring a sliver of doubt.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pirates
programme.desc: Fear is spreading at Fort Taber-Fort Rodmanthat a new \\"living history event\\" has stirred up frightening paranormal activity on the park grounds.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.

programme.title: Operation Repo: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for typical vehicle repossession...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Love Potion No. 83
programme.desc: A love potion causes chaos.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Somebody’s Watching You
programme.desc: Nikki swears she’s witnessed a murder.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: A Sterling Relationship
programme.desc: Nikki charms Professor Oglevee’s older brother.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Amazing Grace
programme.desc: Nikki meets her guardian angel.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Comlicated Situations
programme.desc: After Andi meets with a work colleague, a world of drama follows. With trust and loyalty in question Andi and Gary's relationship is put to the ultimate test. (S3, ep9)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Run Tell That
programme.desc: Zac's investment pays off in a major way. (S3, ep10)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Unlock It
programme.desc: Andi does the unthinkable as she grows tired of the same old story. (S3, ep11)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Dollar Store
programme.desc: Robin has plans to travel back to London soon and wants to take back sexual memories with Andi, who's currently upset with Gary. (S3, ep12)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 2
programme.desc: The strange occurrences at Hayden Hill House switch up a gear as whatever is there seems now to be stalking the team with some terrifying results, at least for some of the crew it is proving too much.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Old House
programme.desc: This week Yvette Fielding takes her Most Haunted team to Coalville and a house that is surrounded by mystery. The team seem to disturb the rest of some of its long-term residence as they battle through a night of terror.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Keithley Bus Museum
programme.desc: Once an old foundry, this large old building houses vehicles from a bygone era that are said to still contain passengers whose destination has never ended.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Presteigne, Mid Wales and the famous Judges Lodgings, were courts were held, people imprisoned and Judges stayed, but it also holds many a secret.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette & Karl investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart take on one of the Most Haunted rooms in this ancient castle. Whatever is there, seems desperate to make itself known.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: To Touch The Moon
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a terminally ill boy and his mother. Meanwhile, Mark deals with a thief abandoned by his folks.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Return of the Masked Rider
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help aging movie heroes to stand up to a street gang known as Satan's Helpers. They persuade a young boxer not to throw a big fight when the gang tries to bully him.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Song of the Wild West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark assist a young country singer who is hoping to follow in her mother's footsteps. Next, they help a widow mourning her late husband.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: One Fresh Batch of Lemonade - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan must find a way to help Deke, a college football star whose dreams of reaching the pros are shattered by a tragic motorcycle accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: One Fresh Batch of Lemonade - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan enlists the aid of a gymnast to rehabilitate Deke. Meanwhile, Deke's parents have been deeply affected by the accident.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Du Plessis is restless after his heart surgery but the family insist he needs to relax. Meanwhile Danny and Alice are happy to have closed down a zoo down that has been mistreating animals.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: While on honeymoon in London, Alice discovers that Danny has some final business to do before they can return home to Africa. He's reluctantly arranged to meet his estranged father, Robert, who has recently got back in touch.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Body in the Freezer
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the “victim” could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Hail of Bullets
programme.desc: The murder of a young father stuns his close-knit community, but the investigation reveals a neighborly dispute turned deadly.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Trust No One
programme.desc: When martial arts enthusiast Carl Hunt suffers a fatal knife wound to the gut, his friends and neighbors offer few viable leads. But Kenda discovers blood evidence that proves he’s being lied to.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: A soldier is stabbed to death at a drive-thru. Kenda’s only clue is that this is somehow tied to a breakdancing competition.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Shoelace Killer
programme.desc: A party on the outskirts of the city turns into a nightmare for some teenagers when they discover a woman’s corpse.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Doubt of a Shadow
programme.desc: Newly adopted Shadow starts to exhibit aggressive tendencies towards his family. A professional dog walker needs help with several of her clients.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bacchus and Jody
programme.desc: Jody, a Lhasa apso, cannot keep her mouth off of anything. From tissues to money, she is the dog who ate your homework and then some. She will eat just about everything in sight.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Harry & Brooks
programme.desc: Harry wants to charge after anything with wheels, including passing cyclists, rollerbladers or skateboarders. Brooks, an Entlebucher, is constantly chasing after light, he is never calm.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tyson, Moose, and Rylie & Tucker
programme.desc: Model Kim Strother is in desperate need of rescuing. Her Yorkshire Terrier Moose is a menace to society. when they go for walks, barking and biting at passersby and their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Kobe, Banjo, and Kisses
programme.desc: An aggressive one-eyed Australian shepherd needs special treatment. A traumatized black and tan coonhound is terrified of people, a Maltese gets a little too excited when guests drop by.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: UK Special 2
programme.desc: Cesar’s adventures in the UK continue with unstable dogs and the people who love them. You’ll meet a dog walker, littermates who no longer get along, and a couple who can’t get their dog in the car.

programme.title: Arthur: Fifteen
programme.desc: How much can Arthur and his friends do in 15 minutes? Can they all accomplish these missions impossible before the clock counts all the way down? Only time will tell!

programme.title: Arthur: Flea to Be You and Me/Kiss and Tell
programme.desc: Pal is itching like crazy and the culprit is Pepe, an Italian circus flea. Then, Emily returns from her summer in Paris with the amazing news that she's been kissed .... by a boy! Now can D.W. find her own Prince Charming?

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: Desk Wars/Desperately Seeking Stanley
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn moves Brain and Arthur away from their usual desks, it sets off a chain reaction resulting in the most explosive desk war in third grade history! And, Arthur is 8-years old now—does he still need his teddy bear?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Spaces Out/The Long Road Home
programme.desc: Inspired by footage of the moon landing, Buster wants to go to outer space someday! For now, it'd be cool to build and launch a rocket! Then, after costing Lakewood Elementary the win in a relay race, George wants to redeem himself.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine Redecorates/Arthur The Loser
programme.desc: Francine and Catherine are very different, but it’s no fun if you're two sisters sharing the same room. Then, there's only one thing in life Arthur really wants—to win! But he just can't stop losing. Is it really so wrong to cheat a little?

programme.title: Arthur: What Scared Sue Ellen?/Clarissa Is Cracked
programme.desc: Sue Ellen's not afraid of much, but when she encounters a really creepy howling noise in the woods, she's scared for real. Then, Grandma Thora has a lot of fun stuff, especially her porcelain doll, Clarissa.

programme.title: Arthur: What's Cooking?/Buster's Special Delivery
programme.desc: Celebrity chef Ming Tsai is judging Lakewood Elementary's first-ever cooking contest, and Arthur thinks he has a shot at winning. Then, Buster volunteers to deliver the school mail and finds out that his new job is actually hard work!

programme.title: Arthur: Caught in the Crosswires/Framed
programme.desc: Muffy is thrilled when mega producer J3 chooses her family for his latest reality TV project. After all, she was born to be star! Buster has just won the best young artist award at the Elwood City Arts Festival.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The RAF’s maritime role is often overlooked. Between the wars the RAF operated elegant flying boats to patrol the far flung corners of the Empire.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: After the war, RAF transports helped keep Berliners alive during the Soviet blockade of the city in 1948/49. As well as flying round-the-clock operations into the airport, Sunderland flying boats delivered supplies by landing on Lake Havel near the city.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: In this programme we bring the RAF story into the modern era. Another aircraft to have extended the RAF’s capabilities is the C130 Hercules. This aircraft has proved its capabilities in countless environments from resupply, to dropping paratroopers.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
